message:
Fullerton Police Dept. Has A History
KFI AM 640
July 29, 2011


The Fullerton PD may have a history with police brutality.  You can read the FPD’s own Internal Affairs department complaint containing allegations of brutality and theft against FPD Officer Cary Tong on Orange Juice.com. NEW VIDEO: Ron Thomas says the large Fullerton Police officer seen making arrests in this video is the same one who was involved in the incident with his son, Kelly Thomas. ********WARNING GRAPHIC LANGUAGE********

<iframe width="640" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/PiNOjG-xlPw" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

http://www.kfiam640.com/pages/BillCarroll.html?article=8899642
